EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Roadshow_Benchmark Breakfast_Australia_Q318.Invite 2 - Melbourne
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Breakfast Invite: Innovating in a Software-Driven World
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
To keep pace with competition and drive innovation, organisations are increasingly learning to become software-driven companies. While many support the business objectives of driving innovation and being agile, organisations often struggle to attain the practices, processes and technologies to support this transformation.
I thought you might be interested in joining Pivotal for an executive breakfast with your industry peers as we discuss: - Lessons learned at the cutting edge of software development in Australia - How to implement long-term transformation within your organisation - Australia insights from the Build To Adapt Framework Report, an industry survey created in partnership with Longitude Research and Ovum
Upcoming Event: Melbourne - 25th Oct - 8am - White Lane - REGISTER: https://connect.pivotal.io/au_benchmark_breakfasts_1018.html
Featured Speakers:Â James Bligh, Co-Founder, RedCrew (former Senior Manager Commercial Feasibility at National Australia Bank) and Roz Gregory, Director Customer Success & Digital Transformation, APJ, Pivotal
We look forward to seeing you there.
Regards,
Lionel Lim Vice President and Managing Director, Asia Pacific & Japan Pivotal
